Name: PLATFORM ALIGN
checklistText:
<size=22>PLATFORM ALIGN</size>

1. Navigate to the attitude using window reference
2. Platform 				- CAGE
3. Attitude Control 			- PLAT
4. Gyros will align to body reference after 5 seconds
5. New 0,0,0 attitude will be current orientation

Steps.Text: Navigate to the attitude using window reference
